name: pkg-json-info-dict
description: Given an array of filesystem paths, gives back a data structure describing the npm project(s) in each path

scripts.postinstall: echo 'TODO: run - typings install - to download the types if you are developing. TODO: figure out a better way'
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --tags
